import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { ListPokemonInterface } from 'src/app/interface/listPokemonInterface'; import { Type } from 'src/app/interface/pokemon'; @Component({ selector: 'app-card', templateUrl: './card.component.html', styleUrls: ['./card.component.css'] }) export class CardComponent { @Input() pokemonId : number | null = 0; @Input() pokemonName : string = ''; @Input() pokemonTypes : Type[] = [] @Input() pokemonSprite? : string = ''; @Input() fav? : boolean = false }
